DOC.brief_summary: Childhood socioeconomic status ( SES ) relate poor physical health , obesity , elevate cardiovascular risk factor iron deficiency anemia . We plan offer comprehensive framework allow `` Nutrition Enrichment Healthy Living Model '' ( NEHLM ) among low SES Kindergarten child . The model offer design take account current economic status child 's family . We shall conduct randomize controlled trial ass efficacy intervention . Our main objective : To compare influence intervention change food consumption , physical activity , caries rate child kindergarten apply versus control kindergarten . The research hypothesis : Integrative Nutrition Enrichment Healthy Living Model ( NEHLM ) improve health behavior among child parent comparison control intervention ( physical activity ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact `` Nutrition Enrichment Healthy Living Model '' ( NEHLM ) Diet Quality , Physical Activity Dental Health Among Children From Socioeconomically Disadvantaged Families Beer Sheva
